thread.section_title: GoRoostr Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoRoostr | goroostr.com
thread.title: Lauren Williams

author: Lauren Williams
title: Lauren Williams
text:
I had two different Macs that had broken screens, one was an Air and the other was a Pro. The first step was easy I told them what I had and what was wrong with each of them and they gave me an estimate for each of them (which was just short of $400 total). They gave me easy to follow instructions along with two pre-paid shipping labels! Within just a couple of days I received an email saying my computers were received and being analyzed. A few hours later I was sent another email saying that my checks with the previously estimated prices were in the mail and on their way! With that money I was able to buy a new computer that hopefully wont break as easily as Macs!!
This is the best way to make the most of your unused apple products!
